name: Marcotte's Arena
description:
Update 4:30 A.M. June 10, 2020

New upload. Sound added

Update 1:41 A.M. June 10, 2020

Character info screen implemented, shows each character's abilities

-----------------------------------------------------

Update 12:34 A.M, June 10, 2020

New upload.  Basic AI has been implemented. Up to 4 human players, Cpu fills in the rest.

----------------------------------------------------

This is my second ever solo game jam game (third ever game jam game) and was a super lot of fun to create. I focused on making everything myself, from the code to the art to the sound. This is why a good chunk of it sucks, but it was a great learning experience.
